thread.title: Panduit receives 3 awards in inaugural CI&M Cabling Innovators judging
thread.title_full: Panduit receives 3 awards in inaugural CI&M Cabling Innovators judging

title: Panduit receives 3 awards in inaugural CI&M Cabling Innovators judging
text:
Panduit receives 3 awards in inaugural CI&M Cabling Innovators judging September 29, 2015 
At the BICSI Fall 2015 Conference & Exhibition (Sep. 21-24), Panduit accepted three awards from Cabling Installation & Maintenance for projects taken on by the company that featured superior cabling innovation . 
Cisco Canada was a program Platinum honoree for their LEED-certified Canadian headquarters, an intelligent building with a converged IP network and primary electrical service delivered via Power over Ethernet. 
Royal Caribbean International received the judging's Silver recognition for the Quantum of the Seas, with QuickNet Pre-terminated Solutions to speed shipboard installation and reduce installation costs. 
Panduit also received a Silver award for its Turn-Tell Labeling, used to labels thousands of cables in a high-density data center deployment in Japan.
